title: How to Get Infinite Experience in Valkyria Chronicles

steps.headline: Learn that The Fight for Bruhl (the skirmish associated with this level) will be open.
Begin the skirmish, selecting Welkin, Alicia, Largo, and Rosie for your troops.
steps.description: You will only need Alicia and Welkin, but Largo and Rosie will increase your turns each round.

steps.headline: Use Welkin in the first round to clear the way of the tanks and cannons.
steps.description: Be sure Welkin destroys the cannon in the enemy's base. Leave Alicia behind for safety during this round.

steps.headline: In the second round, continue using Welkin, saving 3 turns for Alicia.
steps.description: Have Alicia make a bee-line for the flag, using Welkin's tank as a shield.

steps.headline: When Alicia makes it to the enemy's base, have her kill the unit currently occupying it.
steps.description: She can then capture the flag.

steps.headline: Level up your troops, repeating the above steps until all classes are maxed out.

methods.name: Farming the Outskirts of Bruhl (Hard) skirmish

steps.headline: Deploy Alicia, Rosie and Largo near the bridge.
Use Welkin.
steps.description: Use your tank to block shots from the 3 troopers in front. Select ISARA Smoke 1. Target the middle shocktrooper at the bridge and fire. The smoke should cover the 2 Turrets and Light tank.

steps.headline: Use Largo.
steps.description: Take out the light tank over the enemy main camp from the rear. Stay on the right side on the bridge. Largo will get hit by a mine but will get minimum damage, so no problem.

steps.headline: Use Rosie.
steps.description: Take out the Shocktrooper over the enemy main camp. Use Largo's path so there won't be any mines.

steps.headline: Use Largo.
steps.description: Take out the Tank Destroyer from the rear and capture the enemy camp. You should get around 75k exp and 150k DCT. You should have about 4 CP left. Use them for orders in case you need them.

text: Steps Learn that The Fight for Bruhl (the skirmish associated with this level) will be open.  Begin the skirmish, selecting Welkin, Alicia, Largo, and Rosie for your troops. You will only need Alicia and Welkin, but Largo and Rosie will increase your turns each round. Use Welkin in the first round to clear the way of the tanks and cannons. Be sure Welkin destroys the cannon in the enemy's base. Leave Alicia behind for safety during this round. In the second round, continue using Welkin, saving 3 turns for Alicia. Have Alicia make a bee-line for the flag, using Welkin's tank as a shield. When Alicia makes it to the enemy's base, have her kill the unit currently occupying it. She can then capture the flag. Level up your troops, repeating the above steps until all classes are maxed out.  Farming the Outskirts of Bruhl (Hard) skirmish Deploy Alicia, Rosie and Largo near the bridge.  Use Welkin. Use your tank to block shots from the 3 troopers in front. Select ISARA Smoke 1. Target the middle shocktrooper at the bridge and fire. The smoke should cover the 2 Turrets and Light tank. Use Largo. Take out the light tank over the enemy main camp from the rear. Stay on the right side on the bridge. Largo will get hit by a mine but will get minimum damage, so no problem. Use Rosie. Take out the Shocktrooper over the enemy main camp. Use Largo's path so there won't be any mines. Use Largo. Take out the Tank Destroyer from the rear and capture the enemy camp. You should get around 75k exp and 150k DCT. You should have about 4 CP left. Use them for orders in case you need them.
